title: Jaako Rakhe Saaiyan: Child Falls From 2nd Floor, Miraculously Lands On Seat Of Moving Rickshaw!
text:
There is a reason experts stress the importance of baby-proofing apartments; because kids do not know where they are crawling and can easily get through the spaces between railings which can end up in unfortunate situations.

A spine-chilling video has come to light, from Madhya Pradesh, showing a child falling from the second floor of a building. ANI tweeted the video with the caption, ‘Tikamgarh: A child fell from a building on a rickshaw that was passing on road below’.

In the heart-stopping video, one can see the child falling from a height right into the rickshaw seat. It is a miracle that the child survived and the rickshaw happened to be passing from the right place exactly at the right time.

#WATCH Tikamgarh: A child fell from a building on a rickshaw that was passing on road below. Child's father Ashish Jain says,"He was playing on 2nd floor with family members. He fell from railing after he lost his balance. He was examined at a hospital & is safe". #MadhyaPradesh pic.twitter.com/3yDOzZmB9y — ANI (@ANI) October 20, 2019

If there was even a second's delay in the fall, the child could have been hurt really badly by falling at an awkward angle on the rickshaw.

Don't Miss 460 SHARES 586 SHARES

The ANI tweet further reads, ‘Child's father Ashish Jain says,"He was playing on 2nd floor with family members. He fell from railing after he lost his balance. He was examined at a hospital & is safe"’.

It was indeed a miracle that the boy survived and people on Twitter believe the same.

जखो रखे सइंया मार सके न कोय — Pagal hu (@onlyone_desire) October 20, 2019

Rickshawala ke roop me bhagwaan — Pratik Bhavsar (@PratiekBhavsar) October 20, 2019

Thanks god😘😘😘😘 — Sudheer Gupta🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳 (@sudheer9988) October 20, 2019

rikshawala sahee waqt pe aaya — nawaz (@nawaz765) October 20, 2019

The Lucky one. — Main bhi Engineer (@Engihumor) October 20, 2019

What a timing..🙏 — Rahul Singh (@Itz_RahulSingh) October 20, 2019

Some times people became "God" — Siva (@sivatoradex) October 20, 2019

Bhagwaan k apne plans hote hain. — kajal vador (@kajalvador) October 20, 2019

We are glad that the child is safe, the family should probably take care of those railings now.
description: There is a reason why experts stress the importance of baby proofing apartments; because kids do not know where they are crawling and can easily get through the spaces between railings which can end up unfortunately. A spine chilling video has come forward from Madhya Pradesh showing a child falling from the second floor of a building and is going viral.
